answers.answer: Sounds like a problem with your sinuses - have you talked to your PCP?

There are some osteopathic manoeuvres you can use to help clear your eustachian tubes that I find quite helpful (it saves me from pulling the "goldfish" face all day as I try to pop my ears in an attempt to hear normally LOL)If you can't get in to see an Osteo, try googling, as some of the moves are easy do to at home.

question: I have MS,small vessel disease, heart disease & stint, high blood pressure and diabetes ,type 2.  I have a really bad pressure that builds up in my ears in the winter. I try to pop them but that doesn't work.  What causes this and how do I get rid of this.
